text: In the hardness of his heart, Pharaoh would not let the Israelites go, just as the LORD had said through Moses.

The Compassion of Jesus. Jesus went around to all the towns and villages, teaching in their synagogues, proclaiming the gospel of the kingdom, and curing every disease and illness.
Then he sat down, called the Twelve, and said to them, “If anyone wishes to be first, he shall be the last of all and the servant of all.”
Then from the cloud came a voice that said, “This is my chosen Son; listen to him.”
When Jesus heard that they had thrown him out, he found him and said, “Do you believe in the Son of Man?”
And all the inhabitants of Lydda and Sharon saw him, and they turned to the Lord.
